marketingBullets.value: Waterproof – these ear buds are waterproof, allowing you take your music virtually anywhere – even swimming
Perfect fit – 3 sizes of silicone cushions offer the best fit while reducing the ambient noise for optimal listening
Compatibility – pair with your smartphone, tablet, or other blue tooth enabled device for convenient access while you’re on the go; works with sir and Google assistant
Give back – 50% of EcoSurvivor’s net proceeds are given to the 5013 charity, water4, to aid in their goal of eliminating the global water crisis

product.romanceCopy: Adventure is loud and clear with EcoSurvivor wireless ear buds. Simply pair the ear buds to your smartphone, tablet or other blue tooth-enabled device for convenient access to your favorite play lists while you’re on the go. An IPX7 rating means your ear buds are waterproof and allows you take your music virtually anywhere – even swimming. The durable cable is the perfect length and includes an adjustable cinch for unrestricted movement to support your active life. Enjoy the secure, comfortable feel of the flexible ear loop as you move, as well as three sizes of silicone cushions to offer the best fit while reducing ambient noise for high-intensity listening. A built-in rechargeable battery provides up to eight hours of playtime, and the in-bud controller/Mic easily operates your music, takes calls or activates your phone’s digital assistant, even during extreme conditions. A pouch is included to conveniently store and transport your ear buds when you’re on the move. When the journey is tough, get tougher with EcoSurvivor blue tooth ear buds. When you buy EcoSurvivor products, you’re making a difference. EcoSurvivor donates 50% of its net proceeds to water4, a 501(c)3 charity that is committed to providing at-risk, indigenous people access to clean water. Your EcoSurvivor purchase helps their mission of eliminating the world water crisis that impacts nearly 1 billion people and causes over 3 million preventable deaths each year.
product.title: EcoSurvivor Earbud Wired Headphones

storeDetails.storeDescription: For those in the Cromwell, CT area looking to improve their home, your community Lowe's is here to help. Whether you're looking for patio furniture, major appliances, paint or something in between, you can find it at the Cromwell Lowe's. At Lowe's, we're not just a home improvement store, we work to be a part of your community and help everyone love where they live. Plus, we also offer a wide variety of other home items and services, making us your true one-stop shop for home improvement. If you have any questions or need help, our helpful red vest staff members are always around. See you soon!
